### TOTAL NUMBER OF ARTICLES: `r nrow(Private)`

## Publication Details

### Type of Publication

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

PrivatePubTypeGraph <- ggplot(Private, aes(factor(PubType))) + geom_bar() + ggtitle("All Entries") +
    geom_text(size=3, data=PrivatePubTypeLabel,aes(x=x,y=Freq,label=lab),hjust=-.1) +
    theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank(), panel.background=element_blank(), plot.title=element_text(size=10)) + 
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 350)) + coord_flip()

AllAsiaPubTypeGraph <- ggplot(AllAsia, aes(factor(PubType))) + geom_bar() + ggtitle("Asian Region") +
    geom_text(size=3, data=AllAsiaPubTypeLabel,aes(x=x,y=Freq,label=lab),hjust=-.1) +
    theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank(), panel.background=element_blank(), plot.title=element_text(size=10)) + 
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 350)) + coord_flip()

AllChinesePubTypeGraph <- ggplot(AllChinese, aes(factor(PubType))) + geom_bar() + ggtitle("Chinese-language") +
    geom_text(size=3, data=AllChinesePubTypeLabel,aes(x=x,y=Freq,label=lab),hjust=-.1) +
    theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank(), panel.background=element_blank(), plot.title=element_text(size=10)) + 
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 350)) + coord_flip()

AllEnglishPubTypeGraph <- ggplot(AllEnglish, aes(factor(PubType))) + geom_bar() + ggtitle("English-language") +
    geom_text(size=3, data=AllEnglishPubTypeLabel,aes(x=x,y=Freq,label=lab),hjust=-.1) +
    theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.title.y=element_blank(), panel.background=element_blank(), plot.title=element_text(size=10)) + 
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 350)) + coord_flip()

grid.arrange(PrivatePubTypeGraph, AllAsiaPubTypeGraph, AllChinesePubTypeGraph, AllEnglishPubTypeGraph, ncol=2)
```
